eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class PetOverviewMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.PetOverviewMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class PetOverviewMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. Sub menu of the main menu, that is used to view and organize your pets.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    PetOptionsMenu

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        int highlightedSlot)
        Opens the menu for the given player. Shows all pets in the posession of the player, aswell as an option to unsummon the active pet. Also shows the breeding station, with a counter, that shows when the offspring will hatch.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        highlightedSlot - The slot id to highlight a pet or -1 for none.
        See Also:
        PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetType(Player, int), PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetBreedingHatchTime(Player)

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. Cancels the event and initiates the corresponding pet action. Clicking on a pet will open their options menu. Clicking on the string will retrieve / unsummon the pet. Clicking on the egg tries to hatch the offspring in the breeding station.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        See Also:
        getIndex(ItemStack), PetOptionsMenu.open(Player, Integer), unsummon(Player), hatch(Player, ItemStack)

        Gets the index of an item stack, based on its lore.

        Parameters:

      • removeOwner

        public static void removeOwner(java.lang.String petId,
                               org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes a player from the owner map and resets their walk speed.
        Parameters:
        petId - The uuid of the pet, owned by the player.
        player - The player to remove from the owner map.

      • unsummon

        public static void unsummon(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Unsummons the currently active pet of the given player. Only works if an MMORPG character is selected and a valid pet exists. Sets the active pet slot of the player to -1.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose pet should be unsummoned.
        See Also:
        WauzMode.isMMORPG(Entity), WauzPlayerDataPool.isCharacterSelected(Player), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterActivePetSlot(Player, int), removeOwner(String, Player)

      • addPet

        Adds a new pet to a player, who used a scroll of summoning.
        Parameters:
        event - The interaction event with the scroll.
        See Also:
        Continued in this method.

      • addPet

        public static void addPet(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack scroll,
                          java.lang.String petType)
        Adds a new pet to the given player, that starts with standard max stats of level 3.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should receive the pet.
        scroll - The scroll used to receive the pet or null if none.
        petType - The type of the pet.
        See Also:
        Continued in this method.

      • addPet

        public static void addPet(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack scroll,
                          java.lang.String petType,
                          int maxInt,
                          int maxDex,
                          int maxAbs)
        Adds a new pet to the given player. Only possible if the character has a free pet slot. Sets the initial and max level for the pet's stats, aswell as the exp needed to reach the next level. Opens the pet overview menu afterwards, in which the new pet will be highlighted.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should receive the pet.
        scroll - The scroll used to receive the pet or null if none.
        petType - The type of the pet.
        maxInt - The maximum intelligence level of the pet.
        maxDex - The maximum dexterity level of the pet.
        maxAbs - The maximum absorption level of the pet.
        See Also:
        PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetType(Player, int), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterPetType(Player, int, String), getBaseExpToFeedingLevel(int), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterPetIntelligenceMax(Player, int, int), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterPetDexterityMax(Player, int, int), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterPetAbsorptionMax(Player, int, int), AchievementTracker.addProgress(Player, WauzAchievementType, double), open(Player, int)

      • getBaseExpToFeedingLevel

        public static int getBaseExpToFeedingLevel(int level)
        Gets the amount of exp needed to reach the next feeding level of the pet.
        Parameters:
        level - The next level to be reached.
        Returns:
        The needed exp to the level.

      • hatch

        public static void hatch(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                         org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack eggStack)
        Tries to hatch the pet egg, to let the player receive the offspring from the breeding station. It will not be possible if it is still breeding or no free slot is available. The pet will receive the type of a random parent. The pet will receive the highest max stats of its parents, plus 1 point extra, for each parent, that had the stat leveled to its possible maximum, capped at 10 points. Resets the breeding hatch time and parent slots, before adding the new pet to the overview menu.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who tries to hatch the pet egg.
        eggStack - The pet egg item stack.
        See Also:
        PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetType(Player, int), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterPetType(Player, int, String), PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetIntelligence(Player, int), PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetDexterity(Player, int), PlayerConfigurator.getCharacterPetAbsorption(Player, int), PlayerConfigurator.setCharacterPetBreedingHatchTime(Player, long), addPet(Player, ItemStack, String, int, int, int)
